articles.description: 2023 is going to be the year of the sun. Already bringing record heat to Texas, it is all leading to two eclipses over the state. The eclipses, an annular eclipse on October 13th and a total solar eclipse on April 8th, 2024, will serve as highlights of what N…
articles.content:
AUSTIN (KXAN) 2023 is going to be the year of the sun. Already bringing record heat to Texas, it’s all leading to two eclipses over the state.

articles.author: Ameya Paleja
articles.title: Chinese researchers use quantum computing to test Hawking radiation - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: A quantum processor simulated conditions similar to a black hole, and researchers measured qubits outside the event horizon.
articles.content: Over the years, researchers have tried multiple approaches to test this theory. Using media like shall water waves, optical metamaterials, light as well as Bose-Einstein condensates, a state where ma… [+1453 chars]
